sentence.Network_en: The press carried his avowal throughout the country.

sentence.Network_en: This was not a mere empty vaunt , but a deliberate avowal of his real sentiments.
sentence.Network_cn: 这倒不是一个空洞的吹牛, 而是他真实感情的供状.

sentence.Network_en: There were modest tintinnabulations, which seemed to stutter and tremble like a first avowal.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些铃声是缓和的, 好像口吃,又像第一个字母阿阿的在发颤.
